public class BaseRefreshListFragment
extends com.actionbarsherlock.app.SherlockFragment
implements com.actionbarsherlock.widget.SearchView.OnQueryTextListener, android.widget.AbsListView.OnScrollListener, PullToRefreshListView.OnRefreshListener

 支持下拉刷新的基础类
